name: Bus War Camption - Shoot Race
description:
Feel like in the future. Manage flying multi-ton bus. Many movies are our future and the people in it are flying on their machines in the air. A bus fitted with anti-gravity engine goes on a mad race.Collect blaster power-ups to shoot down other buses. Fly as far as you can to get high score.
FEATURES
- Endless levels
- Intense explosive effects
- Plenty of enemies to keep you busy
